alert.note: Alert for Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 11:14PM MST until January 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW OVER THE PLAINS... .Snow, heavy at times, east of a line from Greeley to Limon will decrease from west to east overnight. Light snow in areas further west will diminish into the early morning hours with little additional accumulation. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Briggsdale. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Delay travel if possible until conditions improve Tuesday morning. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
